name: Stargazer
description: The Stargazer is a Huge Monstrosity with a robust physique, characterized by its 12 tendrils and large appendages. It possesses natural armor and has a fearsome presence in combat.
memorable: Renowned for its tendril-based attacks and regrowth ability, making it resilient in prolonged battles.
goals: Engage enemies in combat, utilize its strength and tendrils for control.
relations: Might be found in lairs with other subterranean creatures or similar monstrosities.
environment: Commonly resides in underground areas or caverns.
strengths: High hit points and damage output from multiple types of attacks; can grapple multiple foes.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and mental capabilities render it less agile and ineffective in social scenarios.
attacks: Utilizes Bite, Slam, and Tendril Whip attacks to overwhelm opponents, with grappling capabilities.
most_powerful_ability: Tendril Whip Regrowth allows it to recover from the destruction of its tendrils, maintaining combat effectiveness.
senses: Has tremorsense up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect vibrations in the ground.
skills: Possesses a passive Perception of 16, enabling it to sense its surroundings effectively.
additional_information: Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Can trap creatures with its Wing Trap ability.
Effective at controlling the battlefield with its grappling and pulling abilities.
Can deal consistent bludgeoning damage to trapped creatures.
